death.attack.omni_card.holy_fire: %1$s burned to ashes by the holy flame.
death.attack.omni_card.lethal_poison: The deadly poison corrodes %1$s internal organs.
death.attack.omni_card.explosion: %1$s disappeared in the fire and loud noise.
tooltip.omni_card.card_stack.intro_4: , and after the switch is complete,
tooltip.omni_card.card_stack.function.go: Let the target float and shine.
tooltip.omni_card.elemental_card.to_plac: to place on ground as a trap.
tooltip.omni_card.elemental_card.functio: Deal damage and ignite the target it hits. Place it on the ground and it will ignite creatures that pass by.
Remove flames from targets it hits and cause knockback. Place it on the ground and it will knock upward on passing creatures while eliminating flames.
Summon lightning to attack the target. Place it on the ground and it will lightning strike creatures that step on it.
Imprison hits the target and causes poisoning. Placing it on the ground, it imprisons creatures that step on it and causes poisoning.
Teleports a hit target to high altitude! Placing it on the ground will produce the same effect.
Summon a ground spike to pierce the target that hits it. Place it on the ground and it will summon falling rocks in the air to smash creatures that step on it.
tooltip.omni_card.special_card.to_place: to place and activate the card.
Create an area centered around where this card is placed and ignite all hostile creatures that enter this area.
Ignite all hostile creatures around you when you put it down.
Create an area centered around where this card is placed, and no hostile creatures will naturally spawn in that area.
This card will switch the weather to sunny when placed.
This card will switch the weather to rain when placed.
This card switches the weather to a thunderstorm when placed.
An area is created centered on the location where this card is placed, and crops and plants will grow faster in that area.
